price: 164. En er is niemand van ons of hij heeft zijn bekende plaats.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
